data.comment: The match is underway in Nice.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
He's off! Andrei is shown a red card.
Free kick Nantes.
In the minute 7, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Kasper Dolberg of Nice gets in a strike, but is off target.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Nantes have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Nantes at Allianz Rivera.
Jerome Brisard awards Nice a goal kick.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
In the minute 15, Jean-Charles Castelletto is on a sub for Pedro Chirivella for Nantes.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Nantes in the half of Nice.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jerome Brisard signals a Nice throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Nice.
In Nice Nice attack through Amine Gouiri. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Nantes at Allianz Rivera.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
Can Nantes capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Nantes.
Randal Kolo Muani (Nantes) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
In the minute 26, Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Nice.
Nantes have a goal kick.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 27, Goal! A Dante header gives Nice a 1-0 lead in Nice.
Amine Gouiri with an assist there.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 28, Kephren Thuram Ulien is booked for the home team.
Jerome Brisard awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 30, Nice's Amine Gouiri is whistled for offside at Allianz Rivera.
Nice are pushing forward but Kasper Dolberg's finish is wide of the goal.
Jerome Brisard awards Nantes a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
Pierre Lees-Melou for Nice gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Nantes at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 34, Throw-in high up the field for Nice in Nice.
Nice to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Amine Gouiri is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Amine Gouiri has recovered and rejoins the match in Nice.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Nice.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Hassane Kamara gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nice.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Nantes.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
In the minute 45, Kasper Dolberg of Nice is pulled up for offside.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Allianz Rivera the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Nantes.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Nantes.
The first-half has come to a close in Nice.
Andy Pelmard for Nice has been booked by Jerome Brisard and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, Imran Louza levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
The second-half is underway. Nice with the kick-off.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Throw-in for Nice close to the penalty box.
In the minute 46, Flavius Daniliuc is replacing Andy Pelmard for the home team.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Nice in the half of Nantes.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Throw-in for Nantes at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 50, At Allianz Rivera, Nantes are penalized for being offside.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Nantes have a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Jerome Brisard signals a Nice throw-in in Nantes's half.
Throw-in Nantes.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 56, At Allianz Rivera, Nicolas Pallois has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Nice's Amine Gouiri gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Rivera. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
Free kick Nantes.
Nantes drive forward but Nicolas Pallois is judged offside.
In the minute 61, Nice's Rony Lopes misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Nantes at Allianz Rivera.
Kephren Thuram Ulien scores to make it 2-1 at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 62, Amine Gouiri instrumental with a fine assist.
Kephren Thuram Ulien (Nice) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nantes advance rapidly upfield but Jerome Brisard blows for offside.
In the minute 65, Nice to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Nice have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 69, Jerome Brisard awards Nantes a goal kick.
Christian Gourcuff (Nantes) is making a second substitution, with Marcus Coco replacing Ludovic Blas.
Nantes make their third substitution with Abdoul Kader Bamba replacing Moses Simon.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 74, Jerome Brisard signals a throw-in for Nice, close to Nantes's area.
Dennis Appiah of Nantes gets in a strike, but is off target.
Nice have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nantes's Mehdi Abeid gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 80, Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Myziane Maolida with Dan Ndoye.
Christian Gourcuff is making the team's fourth substitution at Allianz Rivera with Abdoulaye Toure replacing Imran Louza.
The away team replace Randal Kolo Muani with Renaud Emond.
Jerome Brisard signals a Nice throw-in in Nantes's half.
Rony Lopes for Nice drives towards goal at Allianz Rivera. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 82, Nice have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Dante (Nice) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nice are coming forward and Rony Lopes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kephren Thuram Ulien.
Nantes's Renaud Emond attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Kephren Thuram Ulien (Nice) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Alexis Trouillet.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Nice.
Free kick for Nantes in the half of Nice.
Nantes's Mehdi Abeid breaks free at Allianz Rivera. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 89, Jerome Brisard awards Nice a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nice.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
